pages.name: Rewinding
pages.text: The potion of Rewinding binds a creature in the place where the effect was triggered, and starts a countdown. Once the time is over, a small rift in space opens up and teleports the creature to the starting spot.

Interdimensional barriers (such as portals to the nether and the end) prevent this effect from working, and the user is hurt by the rift instead.$(br2)Future research on this potion might allow such a jump with stronger versions of the brew, but for now the potion cannot be empowered through glowstone. Redstone will work as usual, producing a longer version of the Recall effect.
